text: (ki qissa paak hua) (ai rasool) unase poochho to ki kya tum ye samajhate ho ki agar khuda tumhaare kaan aur tumhaaree onkhe len le aur tumhaare dilon par mohar kar de to khuda ke siva aur kaun maujood hai jo (phir) tumhen ye neamaten (vaapas) de (ai rasool) dekho to ham kis kis tarah apanee daleele bayaan karate hain is par bhee vah log munh mode zaate hain
